Key Match Events: Pakistan scored 121 runs in 19.1 overs with 17 extras.
Sri Lanka won the match by 5 wickets with 18 balls remaining.
Wanindu Hasaranga was the Player of the Match, taking 3 wickets and making 2 catches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the 12th match of the Super Four in the Men's T20 Asia Cup 2022.
Pramod Madushan made his T20I debut for Sri Lanka.
Others: The match was played at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.
The toss was won by Sri Lanka, who elected to field first.
